title: Jimmy Carter National Historic Site: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials These lessons utilize primary sources and background information to help students understand the process of resolving conflict. Students will analyze all information related to the Camp David Accords to learn how and why the U.S., Israel, and Egypt negotiated this historic peace agreement.  They will analyze the agreement, understanding that every party doesn't get all they want in a compromise. All Curriculum Materials   Lesson Plan    A Pathway to Peace - Jimmy Carter and the Camp David Accords Learn More     Field Trips Bring your students to the Jimmy Carter National Historic Site. Find resources for planning your own trip and links to ranger programs and more.  All Field Trips     Traveling Trunks The traveling trunks are designed for teachers to use with students before their scheduled field trip. All Traveling Trunks   Traveling Trunks    Traveling Trunks Learn More
